description: Untouched remuxes. Highest possible bitrates with no attempt to make efficient.
name: Untouched

description: Transparent x264 encodes. Saves significant space compared to remux, but still quite large.
name: Low

description: h264 releases with balanced bitrates. Often a 1080p WEB, or a 720p / SD encode.
name: Standard

description: Highly efficient HEVC releases that might be a bit bigger / smaller that nessecary.
name: Compact

description: Properly uses HEVC to achieve a higher level of quality only possible at higher bitrates / resolutions at h264.
name: Optimized
